class ML1MDataset[source]

ML1MDataset(args)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class Args:
    min_rating = 0
    min_uc = 5
    min_sc = 5
    split = 'leave_one_out'
    data_raw_path = 'data/bronze'
    data_save_path = 'data/silver'

args = Args()

os.makedirs(args.data_raw_path, exist_ok=True)
os.makedirs(args.data_save_path, exist_ok=True)

dataset = ML1MDataset(args)
dataset.preprocess()
